poem:
The Big, Beautiful Bill  

In the great ledger  
of bold intentions,  
a marble slab of words  
etched and thrown—  
strident, sweeping strokes  
on the canvas of command—  
all poured into one vessel,  
heavy with gravity's promise,  
bright, yet blurred,  
a bouquet of ambitions  
tied with a political thread,  
its petals caught in  
a restless wind.
